role.argrole: thing violated, usually a rule or agreement

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (PV_PASS+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اوقف) (NP-SBJ-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM السائق)) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM مرافق) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)))) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC لاحقاً)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN خرق) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3D هما)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC قوانين) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الهجرة))))))) (PUNC .)))
